[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [ElevationRangeSource](./harp-mapview.elevationrangesource.md)

## ElevationRangeSource interface

Source for elevation ranges per tile. The returned elevation ranges will be used in the visible tile computation to calculate proper bounding boxes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ElevationRangeSource 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [connect()](./harp-mapview.elevationrangesource.connect.md) | Connects to the underlying data. |
|  [getElevationRange(tileKey)](./harp-mapview.elevationrangesource.getelevationrange.md) | Compute the elevation range for a given \[\[TileKey\]\]. |
|  [getTilingScheme()](./harp-mapview.elevationrangesource.gettilingscheme.md) | The tiling scheme of this \[\[ElevationRangeSource\]\]. \[\[MapView\]\] will only apply the elevation ranges returned by \[\[getElevationRange\]\] that have the same \[\[TilingScheme\]\]. |
|  [ready()](./harp-mapview.elevationrangesource.ready.md) | Returns <code>true</code> if this <code>ElevationRangeSource</code> is ready and the \[\[MapView\]\] can invoke <code>getElevationRange()</code> to start requesting data. |
